Articles.Content:
Yeah, I called it NotKernelKraken, because for some reason it wouldn't take KernelKraken. 

https://m.twitch.tv/notkernelkraken/profile

Also, does anyone know how to turn a stream into a video? I want to upload some parts of it edited together.

4 hours ago, Kernel Kraken said:

Also, does anyone know how to turn a stream into a video? I want to upload some parts of it edited together.

Do you use OBS? You can record AND stream at the same time in the settings, or by just clicking both buttons in the main window.

If not, there is an option somewhere on Twitch to download your videos. Or at least there was. I've not used it in years, since setting up my account, before I knew the OBS option. Also there are hacks of various sorts to download videos that you can install as browser extensions.

8 hours ago, Kernel Kraken said:

Also, does anyone know how to turn a stream into a video? I want to upload some parts of it edited together.

Aren't most Streamers uploading their edited videos on youtube? If you're going for a career as a social media starlet you probably need to do that anyways to increase exposure on multiple platforms.

6 hours ago, 5thHorseman said:

Do you use OBS? You can record AND stream at the same time in the settings, or by just clicking both buttons in the main window.

If not, there is an option somewhere on Twitch to download your videos. Or at least there was. I've not used it in years, since setting up my account, before I knew the OBS option. Also there are hacks of various sorts to download videos that you can install as browser extensions.

Yeah, OBS. I have them recorded, I hope. I'm planning to do something RTGame- esque, uploading 5 minute edited highlights.

 

3 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Aren't most Streamers uploading their edited videos on youtube? If you're going for a career as a social media starlet you probably need to do that anyways to increase exposure on multiple platforms.

Yes.
